message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm aiming for a price closer to the value of the product. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it reflects the value of the product for you.

I understand your compromise, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $980,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
